caption:
This image captures a barren landscape characterized by a dry, cracked soil surface sprinkled with small stones. Sparse patches of green, spindly vegetation are scattered across the scene, suggesting a harsh, arid environment that struggles to support plant life.

The terrain is relatively flat, with a gentle rise toward the horizon. In the far distance, the land subtly rises into small hills or low mountains, adding some variation to the otherwise flat expanse. The sky is partly cloudy with sunlight penetrating through, casting a natural, muted light over the landscape. The overall mood of the image conveys a sense of desolation and ruggedness typical of a semi-desert or arid region.
title: Reclamation effort of strip mined land near Colstrip. Old stock piles are flattened and planted. Dry climate and shallow soil allow only sparse growth.
